title: Ukraine sees ‘progress’ in latest talks with Russia despite ongoing attacks
summary_full: Ukraine’s foreign minister described the Russian officials involved in the new rounds of talks, which resume Sunday in the United Arab Emirates, as much more serious than before.
summary_public: Ukraine’s foreign minister described the Russian officials involved in the new rounds of talks, which resume Sunday in the United Arab Emirates, as much more serious than before.

RU.label: neutral
RU.evidence: latest talks with Russia despite ongoing attacks

UA.label: positive
UA.evidence: Ukraine sees ‘progress’ in latest talks with Russia
